issue.title: [Python] Update timezones strategy to include fixed offsets
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15887](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15887). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
PyArrow tests strategy for `timezones `should also include fixed offsets.

Note: it is not supported out of the box by hypothesis.
